Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Widely praised worldwide, our brake solutions deliver safety and reliability for both everyday driving and high-performance racing scenarios. * Home * Company + About Elig Brake + Our Brand + News & Events + Privacy Policy * Product Line + Bicycle Disc Brake Pads - For Avid / Sram Brake Pads - For Shimano Brake Pads + Motorcycle & ATV Disc Brake Pads - For Taiwan Brands Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads - For Chinese Brands Brake Pads + Motorcycle Brake Shoes - For Piaggio Brake Shoes + Motorcycle Clutch Parts - For Honda Clutch Friction Discs + Automotive Disc Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For Korean Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads + Automotive Brake Shoes - For Ford Brake Shoes * R&D Center + Elig Friction Material Applications and Development + Quality Control + Tests and Product Verification * Support + FAQ + Blog + Brake Pads Warranty Statement * Contact Us Advanced Search # About Elig Brake ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Company * / * About Elig Brake ## About Elig Brake ### Specialized in friction material application R&D and manufacturing Elig Brake Technologies Corp. (formerly Elig Industrial Co. LTD.) was established in 1998. The founders devoted to the development of eco-friendly products of non-asbestos friction materials, and that has successfully applied to bicycle disc brake systems - a pioneer in the industry. (Asbestos is classified as a first grade carcinogen by the International Agency for Research on Cancer, IARC, where the Taiwan Environmental Protection Agency announced on February 2nd, 2012 to ban its use in the manufacture of brake lining after July 1st, 2018.) --- Subsequently, the disc and drum brakes for automobiles, motorcycles, and wet clutches that are made of non-asbestos eco-friendly friction materials were also successfully developed. In order to continuously innovate the products, technical collaboration with the research labs in the US and Japan was conducted, and the manufacture technologies of high-performance sintered alloy brake plates have been introduced from the main US manufacturers in 2006. Our products are selling to several tens of countries in the world. Either typical riding on normal roads or on racing tracks and other fields, all are highly praised by all the customers. The team also successfully joined in the supply chain of Japanese, American and European automotive manufacturers. ##### History | Year | Event Content | | --- | --- | | 1998 | Elig was founded in Taiwan. Brake pads for bicycle disc brake system with non-asbestos environmentally friendly material was firstly developed and manufactured, which leads Elig entered the bicycle supply chain successfully. | | 2002-2003 | Added motorcycle product line with non-asbestos environmentally friendly material, and obtain ISO 9002 / QS9000 certifications, entered motorcycle supply chain. | | 2005 | Sintered brake pad production technology from United States was introduced, entered ATV supply chain. | | 2006-2007 | Japanese OEM non-asbestos organic material formulation technologies were introduced, and Japanese SNT dynamic performance test equipment acquired. | | 2008 | Established new manufacturing plant in Dong Nai Industrial Area, at Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, and started with production of disc brake pads, and drum brake shoes for motorcycle. | | 2009-2012 | America's OEM semi-metallic material formulation technologies were introduced, and testing equipment specified by European E-MARK certification specifications was acquitted added. | | 2013-2017 | Expansion in Dong Nai Industrial Area, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, and second plant was built to increase production capacity. | | 2018-2021 | Introduce the OEM formula technology of Japanese and Italian locomotives, expand the plant in Taiwan, and improve the automation of production lines. | | 2024- | The land of the plant in Nam Định and Batangas has been purchased and is planned to be established in 2025. | INTEGRITY｜INNOVATION｜COMMITMENT｜CUSTOMER TRUST ##### Mission Vision Our mission is to ensure the safety of every driver. As the brake pads are the most important safety components in the braking system, we are fully aware of their great responsibility. We are committed to developing and producing high quality, durable and environmentally friendly brake pads to provide a safer and more reliable braking experience for the bicycle, motorcycle and automobile markets. Corporate Carbon Reduction and Sustainable Management * Enhancement of Driving Safety: We focus on innovative technology and strict quality control to enhance the performance and reliability of brake pads to ensure the best braking effect under various driving conditions. * Environmental Responsibility: We are committed to developing environmentally friendly brake pad materials and technologies to minimize the impact on the environment. We believe that protecting the earth is one of the most important missions of our company. * Technological Innovation: We continuously invest resources in technological research and development, promote product innovation, maintain competitive advantage, and provide customers with the most advanced brake pad products. * Customer First: We insist on customer-oriented, provide quality products and services, and continuously improve based on customer feedback. Customer satisfaction is the greatest driving force for our success. * Global Vision: We are actively expanding into the international market, with the goal of becoming a benchmark enterprise in the global brake pad industry and providing safety protection for drivers in more countries. ##### Factory * Taiwan Factory * Taiwan Factory (New) * Vietnam Factory * Vietnam Factory (Second factory) ##### Certificate * IATF 16494 * IATF 16949 Vietnam * Product Liability Insurance * 2018 Innovation Awards ## Hot Products Hot ### EB-296 Designed and developed specifically for Avid and SRAM disc brake systems, it is also suitable for Trickstuff disc brake systems, providing stable braking performance and durability, making it an ideal choice for cyclists. Hot ### EM-066B Superior braking power and abrasion resistance meet the demand for upgraded braking performance from Honda, Kawasaki and Suzuki users. Hot ### FA31 The FA31 Front Brake Pad is a OE upgrade solution for Ford vehicles. It is designed to protect safety, improve braking system braking force and ensure optimum performance. ### Find a professional brake pad solution for your vehicle! Contact Now!! Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. ### Our Address No. 449, Zhongshan Rd., Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City 208005, Taiwan (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### Latest News * #### 24' UCRR Summer Race (University Campus of Road Racing) *06 Jul, 2024* * #### Taipei AMPA & AutoTronics Taipe 2024 *17 Apr, 2024* ### Navigation * Home * Company * Product Line * R&D Center * Support * Contact Us Copyright © 2025 Elig Brake Technologies Corp. All Rights Reserved. Consulted & Designed by Ready-Market

關於俋霖科技簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 關於俋霖科技簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的關於俋霖科技簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 關於俋霖科技 ## 專注於摩擦材應用研發製造 * 首頁 * / * 關於俋霖 * / * 關於俋霖科技 ## 關於俋霖科技 ### 專注於摩擦材應用研發製造 俋霖科技股份有限公司（原名俋霖實業有限公司）於1998年創立，創辦人秉持著綠色產品的理念，投身研發無石棉環保摩擦材料配方，並成功應用於腳踏車碟式煞車系統，成為業界的先驅。 （石綿為國際癌症研究署(IARC)歸類之一級人類致癌物質，台灣環保署於2012年2月2日公告自2018年7月1日起禁止用於剎車來令片之製造） 隨後亦成功開發汽、機車碟式煞車、鼓式煞車、濕式離合器等無石棉環保摩擦材料應用產品。為不斷創新產品研發與美國、日本研究室技術合作，並於2006年導入美國大廠金屬燒結合金高性能煞車片生產技術。產品於全球銷售數十個國家中，不管在一般道路騎乘使用、還是賽道競技等領域皆受許多消費者肯定，團隊也成功加入日系、美系、歐系的車廠供應鏈。 --- ##### 歷史沿革 | 年份時間 | 事件內容 | | --- | --- | | 1998 | 公司創立，台灣首先研發製造非石綿環保材質腳踏車煞車片，成功進入腳踏車供應鏈。 | | 2002-2003 | 跨足機車非石綿環保材質煞車片產品線，並取得ISO 9002 / QS9000認證進入機車供應鏈。 | | 2005 | 導入美國燒結合金煞車片生產技術，進入ATV供應鏈。 | | 2006-2007 | 導入日本OEM非石綿有機材質配方技術，並購入日本SNT動態性能試驗設備。 | | 2008 | 於越南胡志明市同奈工業區增設生產基地，投入機車碟式煞車片鼓式煞車提片生產。 || 2009-2012 | 導入美國OEM半金屬材質配方技術，購歐洲E-MARK指定認證專用測試設備。 | | 2013-2017 | 於越南胡志明市同奈工業區擴建第二廠區提升產能。 | | 2018-2021 | 導入日本、義大利機車OEM配方技術擴建台灣廠區，提升產線自動化程度。 | | 2024- | 已在南定省和八打雁省購買工廠土地，計劃於2025年建成。 | 誠信正直 創新 承諾 客戶信任 ##### 使命願景 我們的使命是確保每一位駕駛者的行車安全。煞車片作為制動系統中至關重要的安全部件，我們深知其責任重大。我們致力於研發和生產高品質、耐用且環保的煞車片產品，為自行車、機車、汽車市場提供更安全、更可靠的煞車體驗。 企業減碳永續經營 * 行車安全：專注於創新技術和嚴格品質控制，提升煞車片的性能和可靠性，確保在各種行車條件下都能提供最佳的制動效果。 * 環保責任：致力於研發環保的煞車片材料和技術，減少對環境的影響。我們相信，保護地球是我們企業的重要使命之一。 * 技術創新：不斷投入資源在技術研發上，推動產品創新，保持競爭優勢，為客戶提供最先進的煞車片產品。 * 客戶至上：堅持以客戶為中心，提供優質的產品和服務，根據客戶反饋不斷改進。客戶的滿意是我們成功的最大動力。 * 方針願景：積極拓展國際市場，目標是成為全球煞車片行業的標杆企業，為更多國家的駕駛者提供安全保障。 ##### 工廠 * 台灣工廠 * 台灣工廠 (新廠房) * 越南工廠 * 越南工廠 (二廠) ##### 認證 * IATF 16494 * IATF 16949 Vietnam * 全球產品責任險 * 2018創新產品獎 ## 熱門商品 Hot ### EB-296 專為Avid和SRAM碟煞系統設計開發，同時也適用Trickstuff碟煞系統，提供穩定的制動性能與耐用性，成為自行車愛好者的理想選擇。 Hot ### EM-066B 卓越的制動力與耐磨性滿足Honda本田和Kawasaki川崎還有Suzuki鈴木用戶對煞車性能的升級需求。 Hot ### FA31 FA31前輪煞車片適用Ford福特汽車的原廠升級解決方案。其設計目的是守護安全、提升煞車系統制動力，確保達到最佳性能。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Widely praised worldwide, our brake solutions deliver safety and reliability for both everyday driving and high-performance racing scenarios. * Home * Company + About Elig Brake + Our Brand + News & Events + Privacy Policy * Product Line + Bicycle Disc Brake Pads - For Avid / Sram Brake Pads - For Shimano Brake Pads + Motorcycle & ATV Disc Brake Pads - For Taiwan Brands Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads - For Chinese Brands Brake Pads + Motorcycle Brake Shoes - For Piaggio Brake Shoes + Motorcycle Clutch Parts - For Honda Clutch Friction Discs + Automotive Disc Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For Korean Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads + Automotive Brake Shoes - For Ford Brake Shoes * R&D Center + Elig Friction Material Applications and Development + Quality Control + Tests and Product Verification * Support + FAQ + Blog + Brake Pads Warranty Statement * Contact Us Advanced Search # About Elig Brake ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Company * / * About Elig Brake ## About Elig Brake ### Specialized in friction material application R&D and manufacturing Elig Brake Technologies Corp. (formerly Elig Industrial Co. LTD.) was established in 1998. The founders devoted to the development of eco-friendly products of non-asbestos friction materials, and that has successfully applied to bicycle disc brake systems - a pioneer in the industry. (Asbestos is classified as a first grade carcinogen by the International Agency for Research on Cancer, IARC, where the Taiwan Environmental Protection Agency announced on February 2nd, 2012 to ban its use in the manufacture of brake lining after July 1st, 2018.) --- Subsequently, the disc and drum brakes for automobiles, motorcycles, and wet clutches that are made of non-asbestos eco-friendly friction materials were also successfully developed. In order to continuously innovate the products, technical collaboration with the research labs in the US and Japan was conducted, and the manufacture technologies of high-performance sintered alloy brake plates have been introduced from the main US manufacturers in 2006. Our products are selling to several tens of countries in the world. Either typical riding on normal roads or on racing tracks and other fields, all are highly praised by all the customers. The team also successfully joined in the supply chain of Japanese, American and European automotive manufacturers. ##### History | Year | Event Content | | --- | --- | | 1998 | Elig was founded in Taiwan. Brake pads for bicycle disc brake system with non-asbestos environmentally friendly material was firstly developed and manufactured, which leads Elig entered the bicycle supply chain successfully. | | 2002-2003 | Added motorcycle product line with non-asbestos environmentally friendly material, and obtain ISO 9002 / QS9000 certifications, entered motorcycle supply chain. | | 2005 | Sintered brake pad production technology from United States was introduced, entered ATV supply chain. | | 2006-2007 | Japanese OEM non-asbestos organic material formulation technologies were introduced, and Japanese SNT dynamic performance test equipment acquired. | | 2008 | Established new manufacturing plant in Dong Nai Industrial Area, at Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, and started with production of disc brake pads, and drum brake shoes for motorcycle. | | 2009-2012 | America's OEM semi-metallic material formulation technologies were introduced, and testing equipment specified by European E-MARK certification specifications was acquitted added. | | 2013-2017 | Expansion in Dong Nai Industrial Area, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, and second plant was built to increase production capacity. | | 2018-2021 | Introduce the OEM formula technology of Japanese and Italian locomotives, expand the plant in Taiwan, and improve the automation of production lines. | | 2024- | The land of the plant in Nam Định and Batangas has been purchased and is planned to be established in 2025. | INTEGRITY｜INNOVATION｜COMMITMENT｜CUSTOMER TRUST ##### Mission Vision Our mission is to ensure the safety of every driver. As the brake pads are the most important safety components in the braking system, we are fully aware of their great responsibility. We are committed to developing and producing high quality, durable and environmentally friendly brake pads to provide a safer and more reliable braking experience for the bicycle, motorcycle and automobile markets. Corporate Carbon Reduction and Sustainable Management * Enhancement of Driving Safety: We focus on innovative technology and strict quality control to enhance the performance and reliability of brake pads to ensure the best braking effect under various driving conditions. * Environmental Responsibility: We are committed to developing environmentally friendly brake pad materials and technologies to minimize the impact on the environment. We believe that protecting the earth is one of the most important missions of our company. * Technological Innovation: We continuously invest resources in technological research and development, promote product innovation, maintain competitive advantage, and provide customers with the most advanced brake pad products. * Customer First: We insist on customer-oriented, provide quality products and services, and continuously improve based on customer feedback. Customer satisfaction is the greatest driving force for our success. * Global Vision: We are actively expanding into the international market, with the goal of becoming a benchmark enterprise in the global brake pad industry and providing safety protection for drivers in more countries. ##### Factory * Taiwan Factory * Taiwan Factory (New) * Vietnam Factory * Vietnam Factory (Second factory) ##### Certificate * IATF 16494 * IATF 16949 Vietnam * Product Liability Insurance * 2018 Innovation Awards ## Hot Products Hot ### EB-296 Designed and developed specifically for Avid and SRAM disc brake systems, it is also suitable for Trickstuff disc brake systems, providing stable braking performance and durability, making it an ideal choice for cyclists. Hot ### EM-066B Superior braking power and abrasion resistance meet the demand for upgraded braking performance from Honda, Kawasaki and Suzuki users. Hot ### FA31 The FA31 Front Brake Pad is a OE upgrade solution for Ford vehicles. It is designed to protect safety, improve braking system braking force and ensure optimum performance. ### Find a professional brake pad solution for your vehicle! Contact Now!! 來令片保固聲明簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 來令片保固聲明簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的來令片保固聲明簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 來令片保固聲明 ## Elig來令片保固聲明 * 首頁 * / * 支援和服務 * / * 來令片保固聲明 ## 來令片保固聲明 ### Elig煞車片專為自行車、機車、汽車設計，採用獨創的E.F.T. (Elig Friction Technology)摩擦材技術，以卓越的品質與創新技術，提供穩定可靠的煞車效能。所有產品100%不含石棉，通過 IATF 16949:2016 品質認證，符合RoHS 2.0法規，並受全球保險保護。 --- Elig煞車片安裝說明與使用須知。 * 使用車輛前務必確保煞車系統處於良好狀態。 * 根據駕駛需求選擇合適的煞車片型號。 * 須由合格的專業技師參照車輛製造商的安裝指示進行安裝，並搭配OEM的部件一起使用，確保煞車系統的最佳效能。 * 為了讓新煞車片適應碟盤，必須在安裝後進行磨合程序，特別是燒結煞車片。 * 請定期檢查煞車片磨耗程度，當磨耗至2～3mm時，必須更換新的煞車片。 * 因生鏽或自然腐蝕而導致的任何產品損壞不在保固範圍。 * Elig煞車片的保修規定會因地區、產品型號和安裝方式而有所不同。但須注意的是保修只適用於原廠製造缺陷，且必須在正確的安裝條件下使用。 * 若機車前輪為雙碟煞，則須一次更換2組 (4片)煞車片，以確保制動效果一致。 * 安裝時應清理煞車系統內油汙、灰塵及其他異物，並檢查卡鉗的運作狀態是否正常。 * 如果您在使用Elig煞車片時出現問題，建議您盡快與購買店家或Elig經銷商聯繫，同時提供相應的保修憑證或購買證明，以確認是否符合保修條件。 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. As experts in the braking industry, we continue to push the boundaries of friction material technology, and we strictly control the quality of each product to ensure that they maintain consistent braking performance under extreme conditions. --- Elig's development team continues to invest in the innovation and improvement of friction materials, develops friction material formulas in cooperation with American and Japanese laboratories, and uses high-quality raw materials from Japanese, European and American manufacturers. We use Japanese computerized vehicle dynamic simulation test equipment and German friction material dynamic test machine to carry out product development and validation. After strict heat treatment and optimization of precise formula, it effectively reduces the noise and dust when braking and extends the service life of brake pads at the same time. Elig brake pads are used in bicycle disc brake pads, motorcycle disc brake pads, motorcycle drum brake shoes, motorcycle dry clutches, motorcycle wet clutch disc, automobile disc brake pads, automobile drum brake shoes, industrial machinery, agricultural machinery, truck lining and etc. ##### Environment Protection Constant attention to EU ROHS and US EPA environmental protection standards, and devotion to develop and manufacture the products applied with 100% asbestos-free eco-friendly friction materials. The only authorized manufacturer in Taiwan to acquire and utilize the latest NRS 3D integrative manufacture method patent for developing green production processes. ##### Main Friction Materials * Organic Material (Non-Asbestos Organic, NAO). * Semi-Metallic / Low Steel. * Ceramic Carbon. * Low copper / Copper free. ##### Material Type * Non-asbestos organic brake pads. * Semi-metallic brake pads. * Low steel brake pads、Low Copper brake pads. * Ceramic brake pads. * Copper free brake pads. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. 俋霖科技股份有限公司 | 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 俋霖科技股份有限公司 | 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 俋霖科技股份有限公司 ## 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 * 首頁 * / * 支援和服務 * / * 部落格 ## 部落格 ### --- 結果 1 - 3 的 3 ##### 你的煞車安全守護者 - Elig煞車片 煞車系統是車輛最關鍵的安全配備，而煞車片更是其中的核心部件之一，其主要功能是透過摩擦力來減速或停止車輛。根據用途可分為自行車、摩托車和汽車三大類型，雖然原理相似，但設計和材料則大不相同。 你知道煞車片是由哪些材料組成嗎？不同材質的煞車片又有什麼差異？對於新手或非技術專業人士來說，了解煞車片的基本分類和用途是選購的第一步。 ##### 煞車片磨損了怎麼辦？教你如何判斷與更換 煞車片就像車輛的鞋子，時間久了就會磨損。磨損的煞車片不僅會影響煞車效果，還會增加行車安全風險。那麼，如何判斷煞車片是否磨損？又該如何更換呢？這篇文章將為你解答。 ##### 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來 俋霖自1998年創立以來，開發了創新的OE、改裝汽車技術，幫助乘客保持安全，並與綠能結合。我們將這些原則應用於我們所做的一切，安全、環保與性能更成為俋霖守護使用者的保證，無論是新的汽車技術還是我們廣泛的售後市場產品。... 結果 1 - 3 的 3 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年的煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 俋霖科技致力於開發符合不同車型和駕駛需求的煞車解決方案，為自行車、機車、汽車市場提供更安全、更可靠的煞車體驗。 請立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. 聯絡我們簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 聯絡我們簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的聯絡我們簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 聯絡我們 ## 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 * 首頁 * / * 聯絡我們 ## 聯絡我們 ### 不用遲疑，請即刻與我們聯繫以獲得更多訊息！ --- 聯絡我們 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. 摩擦材質應用與開發簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 摩擦材質應用與開發簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的摩擦材質應用與開發簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 摩擦材質應用與開發 ## 俋霖摩擦材料的應用與開發 * 首頁 * / * 研發技術中心 * / * 摩擦材質應用與開發 ## 摩擦材質應用與開發 ### 致力於開發符合不同車型和駕駛需求的煞車解決方案 我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，從自行車的輕量化設計到汽車高強度需求的客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 Elig開發團隊持續投入資源進行摩擦材質的創新和改進，與美、日研究室技術合作開發摩擦材配方，並採用日本、歐美大廠高品質原料。 使用日本電腦實車動態模擬試驗設備、德國摩擦材動態試驗機，進行產品開發驗證。經過嚴格的熱處理和精密配方的優化，有效減少煞車時的異音和粉塵，同時延長煞車片使用壽命。 --- Elig煞車片產品應用範圍包含自行車碟煞、機車碟煞、機車鼓煞、機車乾式離合器、機車濕式離合器片、汽車碟煞、汽車鼓煞、工業機具、農業機具、卡車來令等。 ##### 環境保護 關注歐盟RoHS、美國EPA環保規範，致力於開發生產100%不含石棉的環保摩擦材料應用產品。 取得最新NRS 3D立體式結合工法專利台灣唯一授權，發展綠色生產製程。 ##### 主要的摩擦材質種類 * 有機材質配方 (Non-Asbestos Organic, NAO) * 半金屬材質配方 (Semi-Metallic) / 低金屬材質配方 (Low Steel) * 陶瓷材質配方 (Ceramic) * 低銅 / 無銅材質配方 (Low copper / Copper free) ##### 材質種類 * 非石綿有機煞車片 * 半金屬煞車片 * 低金屬煞車片、低銅配方煞車片 * 陶瓷纖維車片 * 無銅配方煞車片 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. 測試和產品驗證簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 測試和產品驗證簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的測試和產品驗證簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 測試和產品驗證 ## Elig剎車來令片符合高品質與安全標準，涵蓋耐久測試、性能測試、環保測試等，提供可靠的制動表現 * 首頁 * / * 研發技術中心 * / * 測試和產品驗證 ## 測試和產品驗證 ### 反覆驗證與測試，確保煞車片在各種條件下的卓越性能 對於安全性能的要求不僅止於製造工藝，我們更重視產品的測試與驗證，無論您是專注於高性能賽車的煞車需求，還是針對日常通勤車輛的穩定性要求，我們的研發實驗室能針對您的產品進行專業測試與優化，確保您獲得最適合的解決方案。 產品皆依據日本JIS、美國SAE、合作車廠的試驗規範、檢驗儀器進行驗證。 --- 日本實車動態模擬試驗。 採用日本電腦實車動態模擬試驗設備、德國摩擦材動態試驗機，進行產品開發驗證。依據車輛實際行駛狀況，模擬各種環境實施1：1之模擬試驗，研發最適合客戶之產品。適用JASO、UIC、AAR、CNS或依原廠設計code實施測試。 ##### 產品皆依據日本JIS、美國SAE、合作車廠的試驗規範、檢驗儀器進行驗證 * 剪斷強度測試機 * 鹽霧試驗機 * 3D檢測儀 * 高溫試測試爐 * 恆濕恆溫試驗 * 等速摩擦試驗 * 硬度測試機 * 高度規 * 2.5 D檢測 * 壓縮Y機 * 表面處理厚度檢驗 * 表面粗糙度檢驗 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. As experts in the braking industry, we continue to push the boundaries of friction material technology, and we strictly control the quality of each product to ensure that they maintain consistent braking performance under extreme conditions. --- Elig's development team continues to invest in the innovation and improvement of friction materials, develops friction material formulas in cooperation with American and Japanese laboratories, and uses high-quality raw materials from Japanese, European and American manufacturers. We use Japanese computerized vehicle dynamic simulation test equipment and German friction material dynamic test machine to carry out product development and validation. After strict heat treatment and optimization of precise formula, it effectively reduces the noise and dust when braking and extends the service life of brake pads at the same time. Elig brake pads are used in bicycle disc brake pads, motorcycle disc brake pads, motorcycle drum brake shoes, motorcycle dry clutches, motorcycle wet clutch disc, automobile disc brake pads, automobile drum brake shoes, industrial machinery, agricultural machinery, truck lining and etc. ##### Environment Protection Constant attention to EU ROHS and US EPA environmental protection standards, and devotion to develop and manufacture the products applied with 100% asbestos-free eco-friendly friction materials. 1. 前言 為了尊重並保護您的隱私權，於本「隱私權政策」文件中，將讓您了解我們網站將如何蒐集哪些與您相關的資料、資料的使用方式以及分享對象。本「隱私權政策」適用於網站中所有服務的訪客。 為因應歐盟於2018年5月25日生效的一般資料保護規定（General Data Protection Regulation，GDPR），並有特別針對 GDPR 要求進行了使用者的權益說明。 本語言版本僅為方便閱讀與瞭解英文版本而提供，本語言版本並不能取代英文版本的法律效力。如有任何爭議或衝突，在任何情況下，皆由英文版本約束雙方關係，且將優先於任何其他語言的條款。 1.1 服務 本「隱私權政策」適用於本網站中所有的服務。 1.2 變更 我們能會修訂本「隱私權政策」，如有重大變更，會透過網站服務或其他方式通知您，讓您有機會在變更生效前詳閱變更內容。 若您在我們公布或傳送本「隱私權政策」變更相關通知後，繼續使用我們網站服務，即代表您確認個人資料的蒐集、使用及分享範圍必須遵守更新後的「隱私權政策」。 ##### 2. 蒐集的資料 2.1 您主動提供的資料 當您使用我們網站服務來主動發送訊息時，您將可能需要提供姓名、電話及電子郵件信箱等在內的個人資料，相關資料將會自動保護並儲存於Amazon的雲端資料中心。 2.2 Cookie 我們網站會使用 Cookie 來識別訪客在網站上的偏好。在 Cookie 中，我們會使用所謂「追蹤識別碼（Track ID）」來追蹤訪客的行為，例如：追蹤訪客的網頁瀏覽、停留時間、裝置訊息等資訊作為網站內容調整的參考。我們亦會使用Google Analytics的分析服務，來分析訪客的線上行為來作為網站整理瀏覽數據的參考，關於Google Analytics服務，其Privacy Policy資料請參考 https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies。 本站所使用的「追蹤識別碼（Track ID）」是一個匿名的追蹤碼，一般匿名瀏覽網站的「訪客」並不會提供個人資料。因此我們無法關聯這個識別碼到任何隱私資訊，包含：email、手機號碼，或是住址。換句話說，我們無法透過這個追蹤識別碼來知道任一訪客的真實身份。 2.3 裝置資訊 除了 Cookie 以外，我們還會額外蒐集以下資訊： 「訪客」造訪的網址(URL) 「訪客」的來源位址與IP Address 「訪客」連線裝置的品牌、型號、作業系統 「訪客」連線裝置的瀏覽器類型、解析度、色彩支援 「訪客」連線來源的地理位置資訊（例如：間接透過第三方的 GeoIP 反查） 「訪客」連線來源的所屬電信 ISP 業者（例如：間接透過第三方的 GeoIP 反查） ##### 3. 我們如何使用這等資料 3.1 針對諮詢內容進行答覆 針對訪客的諮詢訊息，除提供專業的答覆，並提供相關產品訊息給予訪客參考。 3.2 學習與優化網站內容 我們網站使用上述蒐集的資訊，透過機器學習與資料科學等分析手法，研究如何優化網站內容。 ##### 4. 我們分享資訊的方式 4.1 資料分享對象 上述我們網站服務所蒐集的「訪客」個人裝置紀錄與Cookie紀錄，僅供我們內部使用，不會與其他任何第三方分享資料，更不會對第三方提供特定「訪客」的瀏覽軌跡等敏感個人資料。 4.2 資料保存週期 上述我們網站服務所蒐集的「訪客」個人裝置紀錄與Cookie紀錄，其原始紀錄檔將存放雲端資料中心24個月，並定期依月份刪除歷史紀錄檔。 ##### 5. 您的選擇與義務 5.1 停止追蹤權利 我們保留給「訪客」不被追蹤的權利，若您希望停止網站行為追蹤，請與我司主動聯繫。 5.2 存取及控制個人資料權利 雖我們主要蒐集的是匿名的「訪客」資料，但您仍保有以下權利： 刪除資料：「訪客」可自行清除連線裝置瀏覽器的 Cookie ，或可聯絡我們要求刪除帳戶相關資料。 變更或更正資料：「訪客」可以透過網站提出申請，特別是資料有誤時，您可要求我們變更、更新或訂正您的資料。 反對或限制資料使用：您可以要求我們停止使用所有或部分您的個人資料或限制我們使用。 讀取或獲得您的資料： 您可以要求我們提供您個人資料的副本，並可以要求我們提供數位機器可讀的個人資料副本。 ##### 6. 其他重要說明 6.1 資料保護方式 上述我們網站服務所蒐集的個人資料，除網路傳輸過程期間的暫存檔外，全數接儲存於Amazon AWS雲端資料中心，AWS已宣布符合 CISPE 資料保護行為準則，因此我們網站亦符合國際級資訊安全的規範。 6.2 跨境資料傳輸 承6.1款之陳述，我們網站服務所蒐集的個人資料僅供內部使用，目前保護於雲服務資料中心位置，上述資料的原始日誌檔將存放於美國Amazon AWS雲端資料中心。所有牽涉直接或跨境傳輸個人資料的網路通訊均發生於SSL或 HTTPS 安全加密網路連線環境中，所有通訊連線皆經過2048位元的SSL加密處理，確保資料傳遞上的安全。 * 公司名稱：俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 聯繫人：業務部門 * 專用聯絡電話：02-24989838 * 專用電子信箱：info@elig-tw.com ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技 FAQs | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 俋霖科技 FAQs | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 常見問題說明 (FAQ) ## 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 * 首頁 ### --- ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年的煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 俋霖科技致力於開發符合不同車型和駕駛需求的煞車解決方案，為自行車、機車、汽車市場提供更安全、更可靠的煞車體驗。 請立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. Using the exclusive E.F.T. (Elig Friction Technology) friction material technology, Elig brake pads provide stable and reliable braking performance with superior quality and innovative technology. All products are 100% asbestos-free, IATF 16949:2016 certified, RoHS 2.0 compliant, and protected by global insurance. --- Elig Brake Pad Installation Instructions and Usage Notes. * Always ensure that the brake system is in good condition before using your vehicle. * Select a proper matched disc brake pad based on your driving need. * ELIG brake pads should Only be installed by qualified professionals in accordance with the vehicle manufacturer's instructions. And should be used only with compatible OEM parts, Ensures optimum performance of the braking system. * To allow the new pads to adapt to the disc, a bed-in procedure must be applied right after installation, Especially sintered alloy brake pads. * Please check the wear level of the brake pads regularly, when the wear level reaches 2 ~ 3mm, it is necessary to replace the brake pads with new ones. * The warranty DOES NOT APPLY to any damage to the product that is the result of rust or corrosion. * ELIG offers a limited warranty for their brake pads against manufacturing defects. The warranty period varies depending on the product and the country of purchase. * If the front wheels of the motorbike have double disc brakes, it is necessary to replace 2 sets (4 pieces) of brake pads at a time to ensure consistent braking effect. * When installing the brake system, clean the oil, dust and other foreign matter, and check whether the operation condition of the caliper is normal or not. * To make a warranty claim, you should contact your local ELIG dealer or distributor. Proof of purchase is required to validate the warranty claim. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Whether you are focusing on the braking needs of a high-performance racing car or the stability requirements of a daily commuter vehicle, our R&D laboratory can conduct professional testing and optimization of your products to ensure that you get the most suitable solution. Products are tested and verified with the test equipment by and according to the test standards of Japanese JIS, American SAE and collaborating automotive manufacturers. --- Dynamic Simulation Tester. Adopt Japanese computer-aided vehicle dynamic simulation test equipment and German friction material dynamic testers to verify product development. According to the actual driving conditions of vehicles, we simulate various environments and conduct 1:1 simulation test to develop the most suitable products for our customers. Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. When the rider squeezes the brake lever, the brake mechanism applies pressure on the drum motorcycle brake shoes and the brake drum to rub against each other, producing friction heat, and reducing the rotation of the wheel to achieve the braking effect. --- The motorcycle brake shoes are the key part of the braking force, and Elig uses environmentally friendly non-asbestos organic friction material (NAO) with high-strength aluminum die-cast shoes. Compared to the disc brake system, the drum brake system is usually simpler and cheaper, which is suitable for some small motorcycles and scooters. Its braking performance on high speed and large motorcycles may be relatively weak. Although the drum brake system is gradually being replaced by the disc brake system, it is still used in some motorcycle models, especially in small exhaust and economy motorcycles. 品質控管簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 品質控管簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的品質控管簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 品質控管 ## Elig煞車片品質控管 * 首頁 * / * 研發技術中心 * / * 品質控管 ## 品質控管 ### 品質即是價值 每一組煞車片不僅代表著我們對技術的追求，更體現了我們對客戶安全的承諾。我們深知煞車系統對行車安全至關重要，從原料、加工到最終檢測，每一道工序都嚴格遵守正廠品質標準，層層把關，確保每片煞車片都符合最高的性能標準。 --- 俋霖品質保證。 ##### 品質保證 * 產品完全依據ISO 9001、IATF 16949規範生產。 * 產品皆依據日本JIS、美國SAE、合作車廠的試驗規範、檢驗儀器進行驗證。 * 產品100%產品由富邦保險公司承保100萬美金的全球產品責任險（在安全法規使用範圍內，具有全球保險保護）。 俋霖技術研發。 ##### 持續改善與技術升級 Elig研發團隊不斷尋求技術的進步與新材質開發，投資於最新的生產技術，確保我們的產品始終處於市場領先地位。 ##### 認證 * IATF 16494 * IATF 16949 Vietnam * 全球產品責任險 * 2018創新產品獎 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Widely praised worldwide, our brake solutions deliver safety and reliability for both everyday driving and high-performance racing scenarios. * Home * Company + About Elig Brake + Our Brand + News & Events + Privacy Policy * Product Line + Bicycle Disc Brake Pads - For Avid / Sram Brake Pads - For Shimano Brake Pads + Motorcycle & ATV Disc Brake Pads - For Taiwan Brands Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads - For Chinese Brands Brake Pads + Motorcycle Brake Shoes - For Piaggio Brake Shoes + Motorcycle Clutch Parts - For Honda Clutch Friction Discs + Automotive Disc Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For Korean Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads + Automotive Brake Shoes - For Ford Brake Shoes * R&D Center + Elig Friction Material Applications and Development + Quality Control + Tests and Product Verification * Support + FAQ + Blog + Brake Pads Warranty Statement * Contact Us Advanced Search # What are Disc Brake Pads? ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Support * / * FAQ * / * What are Disc Brake Pads? ## What are Disc Brake Pads? ### Disc brake pads are friction materials used in disc brake systems. When the driver presses the brake pedal, the brake pads come into contact with the brake disc (rotor), generating frictional resistance to slow down or stop the vehicle. Disc brake systems typically offer superior braking performance. --- Elig brakes for maximum performance. Modern vehicles widely adopt disc brake systems due to their advantages, including: ● Stable Braking Performance: Disc brake systems provide consistent and enhanced braking force, particularly excelling in high-speed driving or situations requiring frequent braking. ● Excellent Heat Dissipation: The design of disc brakes allows for more effective heat dissipation, helping to prevent overheating. \* Overheating can lead to brake fade, where braking performance diminishes. The heat dissipation capability of disc brakes significantly reduces this risk.\* ● Adaptability to Various Conditions: Disc brake systems outperform drum brakes in wet or muddy environments, maintaining good friction and braking effectiveness. ● Responsive and Linear Operation: Hydraulic or mechanical operation in disc brake systems ensures more responsive braking. Drivers can precisely control braking force by pressing the brake pedal or pulling the brake lever, avoiding sudden or uncontrolled braking. This linear response is especially suitable for situations requiring accurate braking, such as racing or urban driving. ● Ease of Maintenance and Replacement: The design of disc brake systems makes them easier to inspect and maintain. Replacing brake pads is relatively straightforward, and disc brake systems typically wear out slower than drum brake systems, reducing maintenance frequency. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. How to determine and replace ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Support * / * Blog * / * What should I do if my brake pads are worn out? How to determine and replace ## What should I do if my brake pads are worn out? How to determine and replace ### Master the timing of replacement to ensure driving safety Brake pads are like shoes on a vehicle, they wear out over time. Worn brake pads not only affect the braking effect, but also increase the risk of driving safety. So how can you tell if your brake pads are worn out? And how to replace them? This article will answer your questions. --- ##### Brake Lining Replacement Alert: How to Recognize and Ensure Safe Driving When brake pads need to be replaced, there are usually some tell-tale signs, such as unusual noises, longer braking distances, or the brake pedal (lever) becoming stiffer or looser. Abnormal noises are the easiest to detect, and a metallic scraping sound may indicate that the brake pads have worn down to the warning level. An increase in braking distance can affect driving safety, especially in emergency situations, and may lead to an accident. ##### Key Steps to Ensure Braking Safety It is recommended to visit a professional workshop regularly to check the service condition of the brake pads. Cracks, uneven wear or smooth spots on the surface of the brake pads are also critical and need to be examined and assessed in detail by a technician. Before daily driving, you can visually check whether the thickness of the brake pads is lower than the recommended range (usually lower than 2~3mm and must be replaced). Early detection and replacement will ensure the safety of the vehicle owner and the proper functioning of the braking system. ##### Details to keep in mind when replacing brake pads: disc check and break-in period When replacing the brake pads, in addition to replacing the worn brake pads, check the wear of the discs and replace them at the same time if necessary. In addition, after replacing the brake pads, a period of break-in is required to achieve the best braking effect. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來 ## 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來 * 首頁 * / * 支援和服務 * / * 部落格 * / * 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來 ## 環保煞車片技術革新：可持續發展的未來 ### 低粉塵與無銅配方：煞車片的環保新趨勢 俋霖自1998年創立以來，開發了創新的OE、改裝汽車技術，幫助乘客保持安全，並與綠能結合。我們將這些原則應用於我們所做的一切，安全、環保與性能更成為俋霖守護使用者的保證，無論是新的汽車技術還是我們廣泛的售後市場產品。 所以，我們自然也熱衷於幫助保護環境免受銅的影響。 --- ##### 俋霖的環保創新：引領低銅與無毒煞車片技術革新 俋霖投入研發綠色主流產品，重點開發低銅、無銅NAO與無毒配方的環保摩擦材。煞車片行業正在經歷重大的技術變革。環保和高性能成為驅動創新的兩大主軸。新一代的複合材料煞車片早已取代傳統的石棉煞車片，不僅大幅提高了安全性，還顯著降低了對環境的負面影響。例如，陶瓷技術的應用，使得煞車片在高溫、高頻繁使用的情況下依然能保持穩定的煞車性能。 ##### 環保煞車片的重要性：減少粉塵污染，守護地球生態 成千上萬部的車輛每天都在使用煞車，每踩一次煞車，少量的粉塵就會沉積在道路上，這些微粒不僅污染空氣，還可能對健康造成威脅，甚至下雨時冲入溪流、湖泊對生態造成汙染等。 俋霖除了秉持著安全護送駕駛至目的地之外，隨著全球技術趨勢傾向於支持綠能環境的同時，我們便開始致力於研發環保摩擦材。選擇低銅、無銅配方的環保煞車片，可以有效減少有害物質的釋放，為環境保護做出貢獻。 ##### 智能與可持續性：現代煞車片技術的雙重突破 近年來，許多品牌也開始投入生產環保煞車片。隨著智能感應技術導入，使得現代煞車系統能夠即時監測煞車片的磨損程度，並通過車載系統發出更換提醒，大大提高了行車安全性。這些技術創新不僅改善了煞車系統的性能，也為汽車工業的可持續發展貢獻力量。同時，政府與行業也在推動相關法規，促使製造商採用更可持續的製造技術。 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 聯絡我們簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 聯絡我們簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的聯絡我們簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 聯絡我們 ## 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 * 首頁 * / * 聯絡我們 ## 聯絡我們 ### 不用遲疑，請即刻與我們聯繫以獲得更多訊息！ --- 聯絡我們 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### 最新消息 * #### 2024年夏季UCRR大專校際道路機車賽 *06 Jul, 2024* * #### 2024台北國際汽機車零配件展&台北國際車用電子展 *17 Apr, 2024* ### 網頁導覽 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 * 產品線 * 研發技術中心 * 支援和服務 * 聯絡我們 Copyright © 2025 俋霖科技股份有限公司 All Rights Reserved. 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 | 台灣高品質摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片製造商 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 | 台灣高品質摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片製造商 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技是台灣專業製造摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片及提供摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片服務的優良廠商(成立於西元1998年)俋霖科技股份有限公司專注於摩擦材料的研發與製造，產品涵蓋煞車片、濕式離合器等，100%不含石棉，並通過歐盟及美國多項環保法規。30多年技術累積與全球市場經驗，讓我們成為汽車、自行車與摩托車製造商的最佳合作夥伴。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - This step allows for the establishment of a stable friction layer between the brake pads and the rotor, thereby improving braking efficiency and durability. --- Break-in period for new brake pads. How to break in new brake pads: ● Initial Inspection Check that the brake pads are installed correctly, the caliper pistons are retracted, all screws are tightened, and the gap between the brake pads and rotor is appropriate. ● Initial Break-in During the first 30 kilometers after installation, avoid hard braking or frequent braking. Drive at a low speed of about 30-50 km/h and gently apply the brake pedal to allow the new brake pads and rotor surfaces to gradually bed in. ● Mid-term Break-in Between 30 to 100 kilometers, gradually increase the braking force. Perform a few moderate braking actions to further facilitate good contact between the friction material of the brake pads and the rotor. During this stage, avoid prolonged heavy braking or high-intensity braking, as overheating can affect the performance of the brake pads and even lead to brake fade. ● Completion of Break-in After 100 kilometers of break-in, the brake system should have reached optimal performance. You can gradually resume normal driving habits, but still be cautious not to suddenly apply excessive braking force. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. 俋霖科技是台灣第一間成功將非石棉摩擦材料配方應用於自行車碟式煞車系統的製造商，於2006年導入美國大廠金屬燒結合金高性能煞車片生產技術。並成功加入全球自行車卡鉗大廠供應鏈。 自行車碟式煞車系統是現代自行車常用的高性能煞車解決方案，我們致力於腳踏車產品的開發，適用於公路車、越野車、登山車、城市自行車和電動自行車等。 與傳統的V形煞車或U形煞車相比，自行車碟式煞車系統使用油壓煞車器。該制動系統由碟盤、卡鉗和煞車桿組成。 ##### 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 Elig致力於提供環保且高品質煞車片，符合正廠規格，易於安裝。 Each type of material has its own advantages and disadvantages in terms of wear resistance, braking power, noise, and dust generation. --- What are the types of materials used for brake pads. Common brake pad materials include: ● Organic Material: Produces low noise, is cost-effective, suitable for general road driving, environmentally friendly, but wears out relatively quickly. ● Semi-Metallic Material: Offers better braking performance and heat resistance, is the most common choice, but may produce noise and dust. ● Ceramic Material: Provides stable braking power, low noise, low dust, and good wear resistance, but tends to be more expensive. ● Low-Metal Material: Combines the advantages of ceramic and semi-metallic materials, suitable for higher performance needs. ● Sintered Metallic Material: Features high braking power, wear resistance, and heat resistance, making it suitable for sporty driving, but may produce noise and cause greater wear on the rotors. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. For cars, the typical lifespan of brake pads ranges from 30,000 to 70,000 kilometers. However, it is recommended to inspect the brake pads regularly every 5,000 to 10,000 kilometers. If the pads wear down to the recommended replacement thickness (usually 3mm), they should be replaced immediately. --- ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig品牌名稱源自「Eligible」，代表著卓越的品質、信賴與可靠性。我們相信，只有符合最高標準的產品才能贏得消費者的信任。因此，Elig不僅是品質的象徵，更是騎士與駕駛者安全的守護者。 自2005年創立以來，Elig專注於自行車、摩托車與汽車的碟式煞車片與鼓式煞車皮研發。我們了解每一次剎車不僅是控制速度，更是保護生命安全的關鍵。為了達到這個使命，Elig堅持使用最先進的材料與技術，確保每一片煞車產品都能提供穩定且高效的煞車性能。 --- 最高性能等級，使用在極限賽事。依照不同賽事專車調配打造，搭配NRS 3D立體式結合工法，專利特殊工藝，可承受極其苛刻的賽車環境及競賽時的高溫，專注於全速域制動的靈敏與直接，發揮最大制動效能。 | ● 賽事量身訂製 ● 精準控制 ● 超耐高溫EFT配方 ● 採用NRS技術，不掉皮設計 ● 堅持環保要求準則 | ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 ### 聯絡方式 208005 新北市金山區中山路449號 (+886) 2-2498-9838 Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. 摩擦材質應用與開發簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 摩擦材質應用與開發簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的摩擦材質應用與開發簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 摩擦材質應用與開發 ## 俋霖摩擦材料的應用與開發 * 首頁 * / * 研發技術中心 * / * 摩擦材質應用與開發 ## 摩擦材質應用與開發 ### 致力於開發符合不同車型和駕駛需求的煞車解決方案 我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，從自行車的輕量化設計到汽車高強度需求的客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 Elig開發團隊持續投入資源進行摩擦材質的創新和改進，與美、日研究室技術合作開發摩擦材配方，並採用日本、歐美大廠高品質原料。 使用日本電腦實車動態模擬試驗設備、德國摩擦材動態試驗機，進行產品開發驗證。經過嚴格的熱處理和精密配方的優化，有效減少煞車時的異音和粉塵，同時延長煞車片使用壽命。 --- Elig煞車片產品應用範圍包含自行車碟煞、機車碟煞、機車鼓煞、機車乾式離合器、機車濕式離合器片、汽車碟煞、汽車鼓煞、工業機具、農業機具、卡車來令等。 ##### 環境保護 關注歐盟RoHS、美國EPA環保規範，致力於開發生產100%不含石棉的環保摩擦材料應用產品。 取得最新NRS 3D立體式結合工法專利台灣唯一授權，發展綠色生產製程。 ##### 主要的摩擦材質種類 * 有機材質配方 (Non-Asbestos Organic, NAO) * 半金屬材質配方 (Semi-Metallic) / 低金屬材質配方 (Low Steel) * 陶瓷材質配方 (Ceramic) * 低銅 / 無銅材質配方 (Low copper / Copper free) ##### 材質種類 * 非石綿有機煞車片 * 半金屬煞車片 * 低金屬煞車片、低銅配方煞車片 * 陶瓷纖維車片 * 無銅配方煞車片 ## 俋霖科技公司簡介 俋霖科技股份有限公司是台灣一家專業在煞車片供應的製造服務商。成立於西元1998年並擁有超過30年專注於摩擦材應用研發開發技術，我們的技術涵蓋了各種車輛的煞車需求，提供客製化解決方案。作為煞車行業專家，我們持續推動摩擦材料技術的進步，並嚴格把關每一項產品的質量，以確保它們能在各種極端條件下保持穩定的煞車性能。 成功運用於各類煞車片, 煞車皮, 碟煞, 鼓煞。 俋霖科技致力於協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 俋霖科技邀請您立即瀏覽我們各項專業研發技術與產品煞車片, 鼓煞並立即聯絡我們。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Widely praised worldwide, our brake solutions deliver safety and reliability for both everyday driving and high-performance racing scenarios. * Home * Company + About Elig Brake + Our Brand + News & Events + Privacy Policy * Product Line + Bicycle Disc Brake Pads - For Avid / Sram Brake Pads - For Shimano Brake Pads + Motorcycle & ATV Disc Brake Pads - For Taiwan Brands Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads - For Chinese Brands Brake Pads + Motorcycle Brake Shoes - For Piaggio Brake Shoes + Motorcycle Clutch Parts - For Honda Clutch Friction Discs + Automotive Disc Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For Korean Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads + Automotive Brake Shoes - For Ford Brake Shoes * R&D Center + Elig Friction Material Applications and Development + Quality Control + Tests and Product Verification * Support + FAQ + Blog + Brake Pads Warranty Statement * Contact Us Advanced Search # How to Determine if Brake Pads Need Replacement? ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Support * / * FAQ * / * How to Determine if Brake Pads Need Replacement? ## How to Determine if Brake Pads Need Replacement? ### The following common signs may indicate that your brake pads require replacement: ● The brake system warning light turns on. ● You hear a sharp screeching sound or abnormal noise when braking. ● You feel unusual vibrations while braking. ● The brake pedal feels unusually soft or excessively firm. ● Braking distance increases, or braking power weakens. ● The brake pad thickness is below the safety standard (typically 3mm). --- How to Determine If Brake Pads Need Replacement. If you notice any of these signs but are unsure whether replacement is needed, consult a professional repair service. A technician can perform a thorough inspection and maintenance of your brake system to ensure the safety and stability of your vehicle during operation. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. View our quality products Brake Pads, Brake Shoes, Clutch Parts and feel free to Contact Us. ### Find a professional brake pad solution for your vehicle! Contact Now!! There are three main types of brake pads: bicycle, motorcycle and car. Although the principles are similar, the design and materials are very different. --- Do you know what materials brake pads are made of? What is the difference between different materials of brake pads? For novices or non-technical professionals, understanding the basic categories and uses of brake pads is the first step in the selection process. Application of Elig brake pad materials. Brake pads are mainly composed of friction material and backing plate. The friction material is the part that creates friction with the brake disc, and common materials include metal, ceramic, and organic compound, etc. Metal brake pads are resistant to high temperature and have strong braking power, but are relatively noisy. Brake pads made of metal are resistant to high temperatures and have strong braking power, but they are noisy; brake pads made of ceramic are low-noise, low-dust and wear-resistant, but they are more expensive; and brake pads made of organic compound materials are both economical and environmentally friendly. Different brake pads are suitable for different driving environments and needs. How to choose the best brake pads for your driving needs. When choosing brake pads, specific needs should be considered. For example, drivers who often drive in mountainous areas or on complicated roads should choose brake pads with high braking power, high temperature resistance and wear resistance; while city commuters can consider products with lower noise, less dust and more even wear. Elig brake pads not only provide better safety and security, but also extend the service life of the braking system, bringing the car owner a more economical and more secure driving experience. ##### Elig Brake Pad Series * Automotive 'Standard Type' Brake Pads. * Automotive 'Advanced Type' Brake Pads. * Automotive 'Sport Type' Brake Pads. * Automotive 'Racing Type' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'Ceramic Carbon Standard' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'Sintered Alloy Standard' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'Ceramic Carbon Sport' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'NRS Sport' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'Sintered Alloy Sport' Brake Pads. * Motorcycle 'NAO Drum Brake Standard'. * Motorcycle 'NAO Drum Brake Sport'. * Motorcycle Kevlar clutch discs. * Bicycle 'DuroGrip' Brake Pads. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. We apply these principles to everything we do, and safety, environmental protection and performance have become our guarantees for users, whether it is new automotive technology or our wide range of aftermarket products. So naturally we are also keen to help protect the environment from the effects of copper. --- ##### Elig environmental innovation: leading the innovation of low-copper and non-toxic brake pad technology ELIG invests in the research and development of green mainstream products, focusing on the development of environmentally friendly friction materials with low copper, copper-free NAO and non-toxic formulas. The brake pad industry is undergoing significant technological changes. Environmental protection and high performance have become the two main axes that drive innovation. The new generation of composite brake pads has long replaced traditional asbestos brake pads, which not only greatly improves safety, but also significantly reduces the negative impact on the environment. For example, the application of ceramic technology allows brake pads to maintain stable braking performance even under high temperatures and frequent use. ##### The importance of eco-friendly brake pads: reduce dust pollution and protect the ecology of the earth. Thousands of vehicles use their brakes every day. Every time they brake, a small amount of dust will be deposited on the road. These particles not only pollute the air, but may also pose a threat to health, and even wash into streams and lakes when it rains. Cause pollution to the ecology, etc. In addition to escorting drivers safely to their destinations, as global technology trends tend to support the green energy environment, we have begun to devote ourselves to the development of environmentally friendly friction materials. Choosing environmentally friendly brake pads with low copper and copper-free formulas can effectively reduce the release of harmful substances and contribute to environmental protection. ##### Intelligence and Sustainability: A Double Breakthrough in Modern Brake Pad Technology In recent years, many brands have started to invest in the production of eco-friendly brake pads. With the introduction of intelligent sensor technology, modern brake systems are able to monitor the wear level of brake pads in real time and send out replacement reminders through the on-board system, greatly improving driving safety. These technological innovations not only improve the performance of brake systems, but also contribute to the sustainable development of the automotive industry. At the same time, the government and the industry are pushing for regulations to encourage manufacturers to adopt more sustainable manufacturing technologies. ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998. With both advanced technology and 30 years experience, Elig Brake always make sure to meet each customer's demand. View our quality products Brake Pads, Brake Shoes, Clutch Parts and feel free to Contact Us. ### Find a professional brake pad solution for your vehicle! Contact Now!! Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. ### Our Address No. 449, Zhongshan Rd., Jinshan Dist., New Taipei City 208005, Taiwan (+886) 2-2498-9838 (+886) 2-2498-9836 info@elig-tw.com ### Latest News * #### 24' UCRR Summer Race (University Campus of Road Racing) *06 Jul, 2024* * #### Taipei AMPA & AutoTronics Taipe 2024 *17 Apr, 2024* ### Navigation * Home * Company * Product Line * R&D Center * Support * Contact Us Copyright © 2025 Elig Brake Technologies Corp. 關於俋霖科技簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 關於俋霖科技簡介 | 俋霖科技股份有限公司 俋霖科技的關於俋霖科技簡介。 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 關於俋霖科技 ## 專注於摩擦材應用研發製造 * 首頁 * / * 關於俋霖 * / * 關於俋霖科技 ## 關於俋霖科技 ### 專注於摩擦材應用研發製造 俋霖科技股份有限公司（原名俋霖實業有限公司）於1998年創立，創辦人秉持著綠色產品的理念，投身研發無石棉環保摩擦材料配方，並成功應用於腳踏車碟式煞車系統，成為業界的先驅。 （石綿為國際癌症研究署(IARC)歸類之一級人類致癌物質，台灣環保署於2012年2月2日公告自2018年7月1日起禁止用於剎車來令片之製造） 隨後亦成功開發汽、機車碟式煞車、鼓式煞車、濕式離合器等無石棉環保摩擦材料應用產品。為不斷創新產品研發與美國、日本研究室技術合作，並於2006年導入美國大廠金屬燒結合金高性能煞車片生產技術。產品於全球銷售數十個國家中，不管在一般道路騎乘使用、還是賽道競技等領域皆受許多消費者肯定，團隊也成功加入日系、美系、歐系的車廠供應鏈。 --- ##### 歷史沿革 | 年份時間 | 事件內容 | | --- | --- | | 1998 | 公司創立，台灣首先研發製造非石綿環保材質腳踏車煞車片，成功進入腳踏車供應鏈。 | | 2002-2003 | 跨足機車非石綿環保材質煞車片產品線，並取得ISO 9002 / QS9000認證進入機車供應鏈。 | | 2005 | 導入美國燒結合金煞車片生產技術，進入ATV供應鏈。 | | 2006-2007 | 導入日本OEM非石綿有機材質配方技術，並購入日本SNT動態性能試驗設備。 | | 2008 | 於越南胡志明市同奈工業區增設生產基地，投入機車碟式煞車片鼓式煞車提片生產。 || 2009-2012 | 導入美國OEM半金屬材質配方技術，購歐洲E-MARK指定認證專用測試設備。 | | 2013-2017 | 於越南胡志明市同奈工業區擴建第二廠區提升產能。 | | 2018-2021 | 導入日本、義大利機車OEM配方技術擴建台灣廠區，提升產線自動化程度。 | | 2024- | 已在南定省和八打雁省購買工廠土地，計劃於2025年建成。 | 誠信正直 創新 承諾 客戶信任 ##### 使命願景 我們的使命是確保每一位駕駛者的行車安全。煞車片作為制動系統中至關重要的安全部件，我們深知其責任重大。我們致力於研發和生產高品質、耐用且環保的煞車片產品，為自行車、機車、汽車市場提供更安全、更可靠的煞車體驗。 企業減碳永續經營 * 行車安全：專注於創新技術和嚴格品質控制，提升煞車片的性能和可靠性，確保在各種行車條件下都能提供最佳的制動效果。 * 環保責任：致力於研發環保的煞車片材料和技術，減少對環境的影響。我們相信，保護地球是我們企業的重要使命之一。 * 技術創新：不斷投入資源在技術研發上，推動產品創新，保持競爭優勢，為客戶提供最先進的煞車片產品。 * 客戶至上：堅持以客戶為中心，提供優質的產品和服務，根據客戶反饋不斷改進。客戶的滿意是我們成功的最大動力。 * 方針願景：積極拓展國際市場，目標是成為全球煞車片行業的標杆企業，為更多國家的駕駛者提供安全保障。 ##### 工廠 * 台灣工廠 * 台灣工廠 (新廠房) * 越南工廠 * 越南工廠 (二廠) ##### 認證 * IATF 16494 * IATF 16949 Vietnam * 全球產品責任險 * 2018創新產品獎 ## Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. We adhere to the conviction that only products that meet the highest standards can earn the trust of consumers. Elig is therefore not only a symbol of quality, but also a guardian of the safety of riders and drivers. --- Since its establishment in 2005, Elig has focused on the production of disc brake pads and drum brake pads for bicycles, motorcycles, and cars. At Elig, we recognize that brakes serve a vital role in protecting lives, beyond merely controlling speed. To fulfill this mission, Elig utilizes the most advanced materials and technologies to guarantee that every brake pad provides consistent and efficient braking performance. Whether you're navigating city streets or pushing the limits in off-road settings, Elig is your reliable partner, instilling confidence in every brake. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers.
