俋霖科技股份有限公司 | 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 * 中文 (繁體) + English + 中文 (繁體) # 俋霖科技股份有限公司 | 俋霖科技 | 煞車系統與摩擦材料的環保創新先驅 超過30年專業研發與製造經驗，為全球提供經濟實惠、安全可靠且環保的煞車系統解決方案。 俋霖科技股份有限公司成立於1998年，是全球領先的摩擦材料與煞車系統製造商。作為業界的環保先驅，我們專注於研發100%無石棉的綠色摩擦材料產品，包括來令片、碟式煞車片、鼓式煞車以及濕式離合器。我們的產品符合IATF 16949品質管理系統規範，並通過EU ROHS 2.0及美國《The Better Brakes Law》法規。俋霖科技結合美日頂尖技術，創新推出高性能燒結合金煞車片，並成功進入國際知名車廠供應鏈。我們的煞車解決方案廣受全球消費者讚譽，適用於日常道路及競技場景，提供您安全可靠的駕駛體驗。 * 首頁 * 關於俋霖 + 關於俋霖科技 + 售服市場品牌 + 最新消息和活動 + 隱私權政策 * 產品線 + 自行車碟式煞車片 - 適用Avid / Sram煞車片 + 摩托車 & ATV碟式煞車片 - 適用台灣品牌煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 - 適用中國品牌煞車片 + 摩托車鼓式煞車皮 - 適用Piaggio比雅久鼓煞來令 + 摩托車離合器產品 - 適用Honda本田離合器片 + 汽車碟式煞車片 - 適用日本品牌煞車片 - 適用韓國品牌煞車片 - 適用歐洲品牌煞車片 - 適用美國品牌煞車片 + 汽車鼓式煞車片 - 適用Ford福特鼓煞來令 * 研發技術中心 + 摩擦材質應用與開發 + 品質控管 + 測試和產品驗證 * 支援和服務 + 部落格 + 來令片保固聲明 * 聯絡我們 進階搜尋 # 用對的煞車，停得更穩 日常通勤－賽道競技 # 台北國際汽機車零配件展 / 台灣國際智慧移動展&台北國際車用電子展 4月23日－4月26日 ## 多重規格搜尋 請利用「多重規格搜尋」透過指定符合您需要的產品規格條件進行搜尋。經由指定條件的篩選與運算，將可以更快速獲得精確所需的產品資訊。 立即搜索 ## 自行車碟式煞車片 俋霖科技是台灣第一間成功將非石棉摩擦材料配方應用於自行車碟式煞車系統的製造商。 ## 摩托車&ATV碟式煞車片 與美國技術合作成立T.F.T (Taiwan Friction Technology) 金屬燒結合金配方，專門生產重型機車、ATV等高興能煞車片。 ## 摩托車離合器產品 結合了我們多年來在摩擦材質開發的專業技術，確保了卓越的耐久性、可靠性與性能。 ## 汽車碟式煞車片 採用獨自研發的E.F.T (Elig Friction Technology) 非石棉有機配方，生產無石棉環保煞車片，符合歐盟RoHS環保規範。 # 作為專業的煞車片供應商，我們將以最高品質和研發技術，協助您解決煞車片相關的需求，滿足您的生產和銷售業務。 ## 綠色制動，為地球減速 安全、環保與性能成為俋霖守護使用者的保證，為您打造更健康的駕駛環境。讓每一次的出行，都成為愛護地球的行動。 ## 精工淬鍊，煞出安全新境界 每一塊煞車片都是工藝與科技的完美結合。我們持續研發高效摩擦材料，提供更高性能、更友善環境的產品。 ## 完善服務，客制化解決方案 無論是針對不同類型的車輛、駕駛習慣或特定性能要求，我們都能根據客戶的需求進行調整和設計，幫助客戶提升產品競爭力。 ## 我們的優勢 ### 0 產業經營年資 ### 0 材質種類超過 ### 0% 使用者滿意度 ## 熱門商品 Hot ### EB-296 專為Avid和SRAM碟煞系統設計開發，同時也適用Trickstuff碟煞系統，提供穩定的制動性能與耐用性，成為自行車愛好者的理想選擇。 Hot ### EM-066B 卓越的制動力與耐磨性滿足Honda本田和Kawasaki川崎還有Suzuki鈴木用戶對煞車性能的升級需求。 Hot ### FA31 FA31前輪煞車片適用Ford福特汽車的原廠升級解決方案。其設計目的是守護安全、提升煞車系統制動力，確保達到最佳性能。 ### 為您的車輛找到專業的煞車片解決方案！ 立即聯絡 !! Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * English + English + 中文 (繁體) # Elig Brake | The Eco-Friendly Innovator in Brake Systems and Friction Materials. | Elig Brake Technologies Corp. Elig Brake Technologies Corp., founded in 1998, is a global leader in the manufacturing of friction materials and brake systems. As an eco-friendly pioneer in the industry, we specialize in 100% asbestos-free green friction material products, including brake pads, disc brakes, drum brakes, and wet clutches. Our products meet IATF 16949 quality standards and comply with EU ROHS 2.0 regulations and Washington's "The Better Brakes Law." Collaborating with leading research labs in the US and Japan, we have introduced high-performance sintered alloy brake plates and secured a place in the supply chains of renowned international car manufacturers. Widely praised worldwide, our brake solutions deliver safety and reliability for both everyday driving and high-performance racing scenarios. * Home * Company + About Elig Brake + Our Brand + News & Events + Privacy Policy * Product Line + Bicycle Disc Brake Pads - For Avid / Sram Brake Pads - For Shimano Brake Pads + Motorcycle & ATV Disc Brake Pads - For Taiwan Brands Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads - For Chinese Brands Brake Pads + Motorcycle Brake Shoes - For Piaggio Brake Shoes + Motorcycle Clutch Parts - For Honda Clutch Friction Discs + Automotive Disc Brake Pads - For Japanese Brands Brake Pads - For Korean Brands Brake Pads - For European Brands Brake Pads - For American Brands Brake Pads + Automotive Brake Shoes - For Ford Brake Shoes * R&D Center + Elig Friction Material Applications and Development + Quality Control + Tests and Product Verification * Support + FAQ + Blog + Brake Pads Warranty Statement * Contact Us Advanced Search # Privacy Policy ## Over 30 years of expertise in R&D and manufacturing, delivering affordable, safe, reliable, and eco-conscious brake solutions worldwide. * Home * / * Company * / * Privacy Policy ## Privacy Policy ### Legal Terms and Conditions Elig Brake Technologies Corp. respects the privacy rights and interests of each customer. Elig Brake Technologies Corp. will observe the principles when processing your personal information fairly and lawfully. We take the protection of personal data very seriously. We want you to know when we are storing your data, what data we are storing and how we are using it. --- ##### Personal Information You Provide to Us through Our Site. We may collect and store personal information that you choose to voluntarily provide to us when you provide it through the Site. The types of personal information may include: • Company name, contact name, job title, company website, country, business type, email, telephone number, fax number, address • Other personal information you may include in content you submit on the Site. ##### Cookie: There is a technology called "cookie" which is an element of data that a website can send to your browser which may then store on your system. Some Site pages use cookies so that we can better serve you when you return to our Site. You can set your browser to notify you when you receive a cookie, giving the chance to decide whether to accept it. We use Track ID (cookies) to collect and store information when you visit our website; the information is saved at Amazon Web Services (AWS) and used to identify your browser or device. Cookies do not harm your computer and do not contain any viruses. Cookies help make our website more user-friendly, efficient, and secure. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer and saved by your browser. Using cookies enables us to provide you with certain features and provides us with information regarding website visits. ##### Web analysis with Google Analytics We use Google Analytics to analyze user activity in order to improve the Website. For example, using Google Analytics Cookies we can look at aggregate patterns like the average number of searches that users perform, what keywords users searched, countries and languages. We can use such analysis to gain insights about how to improve the functionality and experience of the website. You can visit Google Analytics’ Privacy Policy at: https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies. ##### Your Information Collected from Other Technologies Besides Cookies, we use other technologies to improve your user experience and the overall quality of our services by collecting the information below: [site visitor] visited website (URL) [site visitor] IP Address [site visitor] Internet Connection Device Brand, Model and OS [site visitor] Internet Connection Device Browser, Resolution, Color [site visitor] GeoIP [site visitor] ISP How We Use Your Personal Information Elig Brake will supply information on our products or any other professional information based on inquiries received. Without your explicit consent or a legal basis, your personal data or browse history are not passed on to third parties outside the scope. Part of the data is collected to ensure the proper functioning of the website. Other data can be used to analyze how visitors use the site. ##### Information, Blocking, Deletion As permitted by law, you have the right to be provided at any time with information free of charge about any of your personal data that is stored as well as its origin, the recipient and the purpose for which it has been processed. You also have the right to have this data corrected, blocked or deleted. You can contact us (info@elig-tw.com) at any time using the address given in our legal notice if you have further questions on the topic of personal data. All the collected information is saved for 24 months on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and regularly deleted every month. ##### The Protection of Your Personal Data Your personal data is stored on Amazon Web Services (AWS). AWS Announces CISPE Membership and Compliance with First-Ever Code of Conduct for Data Protection in the Cloud. ##### Information Security We use standard security technology SSL or HTTPS standard technology for keeping an internet connection secure and safeguarding any sensitive data that is being sent between two systems, preventing criminals from reading and modifying any information transferred, including potential personal details. ##### Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our information practices. If we make any material changes we will notify you by email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account) or by means of a notice on this website prior to the change becoming effective. ##### Contact Us If you have any questions about how we protect your personal information, please contact us: * Company Name: Elig Brake Technologies Corp. * Contact Person: Sales Department * Email: info@elig-tw.com * Tel: 886-2-24989838 ## Elig Brake Elig Brake Technologies Corp. is Taiwan supplier and manufacturer in Transportation Equipment and Parts Industry Elig Brake has been offering our customers high quality Disc Brake, Disc Brake Pads, Brake Pad, Brake since 1998.
